# File lib/charts/bar_chart.rb, line 13
  def labeled_data(newdata)
    ticks = []
    @data = []
    i = 1

    @options[:bars] ||= {}
    if newdata[0][0].is_a? Numeric
      axis = :yaxis
      @options[:bars][:horizontal] = true
    else
      axis = :xaxis
      @options[:bars][:horizontal] = false
    end

    newdata.each do |a|
      if axis == :xaxis
        @data << [i,a[1]]
        ticks << [i + 0.5, a[0]]
      else
        @data << [a[0],i]
        ticks << [i + 0.5, a[1]]
      end
      i += 1
    end
    @data = [@data]
    @options[axis] ||= {}
    @options[axis][:ticks] = ticks
  end
